text: The Banu Sahm () is a clan of the Quraish tribe. They are related to the Banu Jumah, as they both were part of a larger clan descended from the same ancestor, the Banu Husays. ==People== *Khunais ibn Hudhaifa IslamWeb * 'Amr ibn al-'As * Hisham ibn al-A'as * 'Abd Allah ibn 'Amr ibn al-'As ==See also== *Islam *At-Takathur, verse 1-2 ==References== Category:Arab groups
title: Banu Sahm
